# ovirt_wait_for_ip (Data Source)

This data source will wait for the VM to report an IP address.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `vm_id` (String) ID of the oVirt VM.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
